Source.Name: aubio
Source.Summary: Library for extracting annotations from audio signals
Source.Description: aubio is a tool designed for the extraction of annotations from audio signals. Its features include segmenting a sound file before each o its attacks, performing pitch detection, tapping the beat and producing MIDI streams from live audio.
